description.value:
Creatures exosed to it must pass -20 Toughness Test or suffer 1d10 Strength damage, +1d10 per DoF (non-permenant). Requires -10 Chem-Use test to apply, load, or handle this poison, failiure counts as being exposed to it. Contact poison, causes spinebark tree to grow over a paralyzed victim.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
